description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Cannes vs Reims in the Coupe de France
title: Cannes vs Reims: Coupe de France stats & head-to-head
title_page: Cannes vs Reims: Coupe de France stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Full Time
Second Half ends, Cannes 1, Reims 2.
Post
Amadou Koné (Reims) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Post
Almike N'Diaye (Cannes) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Post
Attempt missed. Dassiémou Mai (Cannes) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Théo Trinker.
Post
Fourth official has announced 5 minutes of added time.
Post
Houssen Abderrahmane (Cannes) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Post
Ange Tia (Reims) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Post
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Post
Delay in match because of an injury Mory Gbane (Reims).
